H0.text: Mass is what beakers and graduated cylinders are designed to measure.

H1.text: Density is what beakers and graduated cylinders are designed to measure.

H2.text: Volume is what beakers and graduated cylinders are designed to measure.

H3.text: Viscosity is what beakers and graduated cylinders are designed to measure.

A4.text: Graduated cylinders are often used to measure the volume of a liquid.
